About the Company: Auro Laboratories Ltd is engaged in the business of manufacturing active pharmaceutical ingredients (API`s), intermediates and generic formulations.The company is primarily focused on manufacturing anti-diabetic drugs. Presently the company offers its products inthe therapeutic segment such as antihistamine, anti-fungal, anti-ulcer, anti-malaria, anti-inflammatory, antacids and others. They export their products to countries like Egypt, Germany, Malaysia, Singapore, South Africa, Brazil, Spain and United Kingdom.
